meanings.definition: The action or process of investing money for profit.
meanings.sent1: Her investment in the stock market paid off handsomely.
meanings.sent2: He made a wise investment in real estate.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her investment in lottery tickets was her retirement plan.
meanings.sent4: His investment in education was the key to his success.
meanings.sent5: The investment in renewable energy will benefit future generations.

meanings.definition: A thing that is worth buying because it may be profitable or useful in the future.
meanings.sent1: The antique vase turned out to be a valuable investment.
meanings.sent2: Buying a good quality laptop is a smart investment.
meanings.sent3: His investment in a robot vacuum cleaner made his life easier.
meanings.sent4: Her investment in friendship brought her joy and support.
meanings.sent5: Investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.
